text: @realDonaldTrump The stocks are not a gauge of overall economic health. We're on the brink of the worst economic collapse since the Hoover administration, corporate profits have crumpled, unemployment is raging, Americans have the coronavirus, and are dying and there's no turnaround in sight.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
